a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Share of young women vs. men who are not in education, employment
Share of youth not in education, employment, or training, refers to the percentage of young individuals, aged 15 to 24, who
are not participating in any form of educational program, employment, or vocational training.
Share of young men not in education, employment or training
Share of young women not in education, employment or
Data source: World Bank (2023); World Bank (world region definitions)
